ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:name: MWS2R3 - Avecto - Common Prereqs
ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:body:
# Load Common functions . .\Logging.ps1 . .\GlobalRepository.ps1 . .\LaunchProcess.ps1 . .\FilesUtility.ps1 . .\PlatformUtils.ps1 . .\UsersUtility.ps1
# get current script location $scriptPath = split-path -parent $MyInvocation.MyCommand.Definition $scriptName = $MyInvocation.MyCommand.Name
ConfigureLogging $scriptPath $scriptName
######################################################################### # Main #########################################################################
$DomainFQDN = (get-globalvariable("Global\DomainFQDN")).value $DomainNetBIOS = (get-globalvariable("Global\DomainNetBIOS")).value $DomainDN = (get-globalvariable("AD\DistinguishedName")).value $DomAdminName = (get-globalvariable("Global/DeploymentUsername")).value $DomAdminPwd = get-serviceAccountPassword -username $DomAdminName.ToLower() # Covert to lowercase as get-serviceAccountPassword function is case sensitive $ServiceAccountName = "$DomainNetBIOS\$ADP_SERVICEACCOUNT" # Svc account not set as a local env variable yet so need to reference BluePrint variable $ServiceAccountPwd = get-serviceAccountPassword -username $ADP_SERVICEACCOUNT # Bug in get-serviceAccountPassword function where it is case sensitive and not all values are stored in lowercase $ADCustomerAppDN = "OU=Avecto,OU=Application Groups,OU=Customer,$DomainDN" $GPODomainController = Get-Computername -ComponentID DC12 -InstanceID 001 $PShEXE = "$PSHome\Powershell.exe"
Log "**** Starting: Common Pre-Reqs Config... ****" Log "`n"
Log "Copy required content locally" # Will be copied to C:\Users\<profile> Get-AppFiles "PC Devices\Avecto" Get-AppFiles "PC Devices\Misc\WindowsFeatures_Prereq" Log "`n"
Log "Set Timezone..." tzutil /s "$OS_TIMEZONE" If ($LastExitCode -ne 0) {Log "ERROR: Timezone could not be set. Possibly due to inability to enumerate variables."; EXIT 1} Log "`n"
Log "Installing Windows 2012 Roles (.NET 3.5 - includes .NET 2.0 and 3.0)..." # .NET 4.0 is already included in the Server SOE Log " **KB2966828 | .NET 3.5 prereq on Win2012 as per KB3005628" CMD /c Start /WAIT WUSA.exe "$ScriptPath\WindowsFeatures_Prereq\Windows8.1-KB2966828-x64.msu" /quiet /norestart /log:"$env:windir\Debug\Avecto\$env:computername-KB3005628.log" Log " **.NET 3.5" $Feature = Install-WindowsFeature -Name NET-Framework-Core -Source "$ScriptPath\WindowsFeatures_Prereq\sxs" -LogPath "$env:windir\Debug\Avecto\$env:computername-Roles_.NET3.5.log" # Source switch used for .NET 3.5 only If (!($Feature.Success)) {Log "ERROR: Failed to install Windows Roles and Features. Exiting..."; EXIT 1} Log "`n"
Log "Installing Windows 2012 Features (BITS, GPMC, AD Tools)..." $Feature = Install-WindowsFeature -Name BITS-IIS-Ext,RSAT-Bits-Server,GPMC,RSAT-ADDS-Tools,RSAT-AD-PowerShell,RSAT-ADLDS -LogPath "$env:windir\Debug\Avecto\$env:computername-Features.log" If (!($Feature.Success)) {Log "ERROR: Failed to install Windows Roles and Features. Exiting..."; EXIT 1} Log "`n" Start-Sleep -Seconds 30
Log "Define local admins..." # Does not require domain credentials to run # Note: svc account needs to be local admin prior to calling any LaunchProcessAsUser function, as it needs logon as a batch job rights AddUserToLocalAdministrators -ServerName "$env:Computername" -UserName "$ServiceAccountName" If (!(net LocalGroup Administrators | Select-String -Pattern $ADP_SERVICEACCOUNT)) {"ERROR: $ServiceAccountName could not be added to local admins"; EXIT 1} # Validate local admin
net user /add PCDevices_Admin PCdevices@dmin # Create local account AddUserToLocalAdministrators -ServerName "$env:Computername" -UserName "$env:Computername\PCDevices_Admin" Log "`n"
Log " ** Creating AD Objects" # Modify PS1 file $PS1File = "$ScriptPath\Defendpoint\Scripts\Avecto-AD Object-Creation.ps1" (Get-Content $PS1File) | ForEach-Object { $_ -replace "DomainFQDN =.*" , "DomainFQDN = `"$DomainFQDN`"" } | Set-Content $PS1File (Get-Content $PS1File) | ForEach-Object { $_ -replace "DomainNetBIOS =.*" , "DomainNetBIOS = `"$DomainNetBIOS`"" } | Set-Content $PS1File (Get-Content $PS1File) | ForEach-Object { $_ -replace "DomainDN =.*" , "DomainDN = `"$DomainDN`"" } | Set-Content $PS1File (Get-Content $PS1File) | ForEach-Object { $_ -replace "ADCustomerAppDN =.*" , "ADCustomerAppDN = `"$ADCustomerAppDN`"" } | Set-Content $PS1File (Get-Content $PS1File) | ForEach-Object { $_ -replace "GPODomainController =.*" , "GPODomainController = `"$GPODomainController`"" } | Set-Content $PS1File
# Run PS1 file using svc account credentials $ArgList = "-file `"$PS1File`"" $ret = LaunchProcessAsUser "$PShEXE" $ArgList $DomAdminName $DomAdminPwd If ($ret -ne 0 -And $ret -ne 3010) {Log "ERROR: Exitcode = $ret. Failed to create AD objects. Exiting..."; EXIT 1} Log "`n"
Log "Creating User Profile Cleanup Task..." $SchTasks_Date = (Get-Date).AddDays(5).ToString("MM/dd/yyyy") $ProfPath = $env:UserProfile # Create Agility User cleanup script echo "Get-CimInstance win32_userprofile -Verbose | Where {`$_.LocalPath -eq '$ProfPath'} | Remove-CimInstance -Verbose" > $env:windir\Debug\Avecto\Agility-DelProf-$env:USERNAME.ps1 SchTasks /Create /SC "Once" /SD $SchTasks_Date /ST 01:00 /F /RU "SYSTEM" /TN "Agility-DelProf-$env:USERNAME" /TR "Powershell.exe -File '$env:windir\Debug\Avecto\Agility-DelProf-$env:USERNAME.ps1'" Log "`n"
Log "**** Finished: Common Pre-Reqs Config... ****"

ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:name: MWS2R3 - Avecto - Defendpoint Install
MWS2R3 - Avecto - Prereqs
ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:body:
# Load Common functions . .\Logging.ps1 . .\GlobalRepository.ps1 . .\LaunchProcess.ps1 . .\FilesUtility.ps1 . .\PlatformUtils.ps1 . .\UsersUtility.ps1
# get current script location $scriptPath = split-path -parent $MyInvocation.MyCommand.Definition $scriptName = $MyInvocation.MyCommand.Name
ConfigureLogging $scriptPath $scriptName
######################################################################### # Main #########################################################################
$DomainNetBIOS = (get-globalvariable("Global\DomainNetBIOS")).value
Log "**** Starting: Common Pre-Reqs Config... ****" Log "`n"
Log "Copy required content locally" # Will be copied to C:\Users\<profile> Get-AppFiles "PC Devices\Avecto" Get-AppFiles "PC Devices\Misc\WindowsFeatures_Prereq" Log "`n"
Log "Set Timezone..." tzutil /s "$OS_TIMEZONE" If ($LastExitCode -ne 0) {Log "ERROR: Timezone could not be set. Possibly due to inability to enumerate variables."; EXIT 1} Log "`n"
Log "Installing Windows 2012 Roles (.NET 3.5 - includes .NET 2.0 and 3.0)..." # .NET 4.0 is already included in the Server SOE Log " **KB2966828 | .NET 3.5 prereq on Win2012 as per KB3005628" CMD /c Start /WAIT WUSA.exe "$ScriptPath\WindowsFeatures_Prereq\Windows8.1-KB2966828-x64.msu" /quiet /norestart /log:"$env:windir\Debug\ConfigMgr2012\$env:Computername\$env:computername-KB3005628.log" Log " **.NET 3.5" $Feature = Install-WindowsFeature -Name NET-Framework-Core -Source "$ScriptPath\WindowsFeatures_Prereq\sxs" -LogPath "$env:windir\Debug\ConfigMgr2012\$env:Computername\$env:computername-Roles_.NET3.5.log" # Source switch used for .NET 3.5 only If (!($Feature.Success)) {Log "ERROR: Failed to install Windows Roles and Features. Exiting..."; EXIT 1} Log "`n"
Log "Installing Windows 2012 Features (BITS, GPMC, AD Tools)..." $Feature = Install-WindowsFeature -Name BITS-IIS-Ext,RSAT-Bits-Server,GPMC,RSAT-ADDS-Tools,RSAT-ADLDS -LogPath "$env:windir\Debug\Avecto\$env:Computername\$env:computername-Features.log" If (!($Feature.Success)) {Log "ERROR: Failed to install Windows Roles and Features. Exiting..."; EXIT 1} Log "`n" Start-Sleep -Seconds 30
Log "Define Local Admins..." # Does not require domain credentials to run net user /add PCDevices_Admin PCdevices@dmin # Create local account AddUserToLocalAdministrators -ServerName "$env:Computername" -UserName "$env:Computername\PCDevices_Admin" AddUserToLocalAdministrators -ServerName "$env:Computername" -UserName "$DomainNetBIOS\DEL-G-CSC Infrastructure Services" Log "`n"
Log "Creating User Profile Cleanup Task..." $SchTasks_Date = (Get-Date).AddDays(5).ToString("MM/dd/yyyy") $ProfPath = $env:UserProfile # Create Agility User cleanup script echo "Get-CimInstance win32_userprofile -Verbose | Where {`$_.LocalPath -eq '$ProfPath'} | Remove-CimInstance -Verbose" > $env:windir\Debug\Avecto\Agility-DelProf-$env:USERNAME.ps1 SchTasks /Create /SC "Once" /SD $SchTasks_Date /ST 01:00 /F /RU "SYSTEM" /TN "Agility-DelProf-$env:USERNAME" /TR "Powershell.exe -File '$env:windir\Debug\Avecto\Agility-DelProf-$env:USERNAME.ps1'" Log "`n"
Log "**** Finished: Common Pre-Reqs Config... ****"

ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:name: MWS2R3 - Avecto - Defendpoint Install
ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:body:
# Load Common functions . .\Logging.ps1 . .\GlobalRepository.ps1 . .\LaunchProcess.ps1 . .\FilesUtility.ps1 . .\PlatformUtils.ps1
# get current script location $scriptPath = split-path -parent $MyInvocation.MyCommand.Definition $scriptName = $MyInvocation.MyCommand.Name
ConfigureLogging $scriptPath $scriptName
######################################################################### # Main #########################################################################
#Use ArgList variable in Start-Process commands so embedded variables and env variables resolve
Log "**** Starting: Avecto Defendpoint Install... ****" Log "`n"
Log "Install Avecto Defendpoint..." $arglist = "/S /v/qn" $ret = Start-Process -NoNewWindow -Wait -PassThru -FilePath "$ScriptPath\Defendpoint\DefendpointManagementConsoles_x64.exe" -ArgumentList $arglist If ($ret.exitcode -ne 0 -And $ret.exitcode -ne 3010) {Log "ERROR: $ret.exitcode - Failed to install Avecto Defendpoint. Exiting..."; EXIT 1} Log "`n"
Log "**** Finished: Avecto Defendpoint Install... ****"

ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:name: MWS2R3 - Unit Testing

ns1:variable.ns1:name: TESTSCRIPTS
ns1:variable.ns1:description: ";" delimited string of scripts to execute. No leading "\".

ns1:variable.ns1:name: TESTFRAMEWORKFOLDER
ns1:variable.ns1:description: Folder name where test framework files are stored
